Package Database

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
Database.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scheduler, SQLQuery
public class Appointment extends Object implements SQLQuery, Scheduler
Enables the creation and manipulation of appointment objects, and their data members.
